title: Yahoo mail in Firefox browser just displays symbols instead of text after installing Mac OS 13.0.1 Ventura on iMac
content:
I've attached an image. Installed Mac OS 13.0.01 Ventura on my iMac and now Yahoo Mail displays as shown in the attachment. All symbols, no readable text. I've been using Firefox for many years but I'm so frustrated I launched Safari this PM and Yahoo Mail opened fine. Hate to make the switch, but...

Any thoughts?

Thanks, Larrybarsky@yahoo.com
creator: larrybarsky

title: change top left icon in kubuntu
content: as you can see there is this image on top-left of kubuntu firefox. icon image I want to change it. how do I do it?

title: New look after update today (11/25/2022)
content: So now there is a grey opaque screen laying over my Gmail theme background. I don't like it! Is there any way to get back to how the look was before? This all happened after I updated Firefox today. Thank you, -Tom
creator: tbfitch

title: Firefox Constant Updates??
content: I am updated to the latest Firefox. Every time I close Firefox out and then come back, it does the whole new update spiel all over again and I have to go through it and get rid of that new little weird tab thingy. If it was a one time thing, there'd be no problem but this happens EVERY SINGLE TIME since the last update. What do I do?
creator: andiethesim
